text: Eleven cases pertaining to violation of poll norms have been registered in the district. Collector K. Nandakumar said eight cases were registered in the Perambalur Assembly constituency and three in the Kunnam seat. The violations pertained to use of party flags in vehicles without permission, organising meeting without prior intimation and non-clearing of advertisement unauthorised electioneering hoardings.
title: 11 cases registered
